valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sat 27 Sep 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 28 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Rockall 1001 expected 100 miles east of Iceland 1004 by 0600 tomorrow. Low just west of FitzRoy 992 expected Portugal 1005 by same time. New low expected Fair Isle 1012 by that time. High Sweden 1037 moving slowly away east
